text: you know we talk a lot internally about
leadership in in the Samsung context and
I I would pick up pick out a few
characteristics number one would be
Vision so as a leader of any
organization whether it's you know one
person or 100,000 people setting a
vision for that organization is the fun
fundamental responsibility of the of the
leader and it's also their challenge to
really get people aligned and excited by
that so I think vision is very important
I think another thing is the the
followership so you can only have
leaders if you have followers and that
leader needs to really instill in all
the people who are working with them a
sense of shared goals of open
communication common responsibilities so
if you're a leader what are your
responsibilities to the people who are
working with you in terms of open
communication and so on the third
characteristic I would say it's back to
the discussion about globalization is
you've got to have a global mindset so
you've got to have the flexibility to
understand different countries different
cultures how you build your business
across a global footprint I would say
those are sort of key elements of of
business business leadership but number
one easily is vision
